snippet: Mr. Darabont will write, direct and produce the pilot episode of "L.A. Noir," a drama adapted from John Buntin's nonfiction book and chronicling the conflict between the Los Angeles police chief William Parker and the mobster Mickey Cohen in the...
abstract: Mr. Darabont will write, direct and produce the pilot episode of "L.A. Noir," a drama adapted from John Buntin's nonfiction book and chronicling the conflict between the Los Angeles police chief William Parker and the mobster Mickey Cohen in the 1940s and '50s.
lead_paragraph: Months after his abrupt departure from AMC's hit zombie series, "The Walking Dead," Frank Darabont has risen again to write, direct and produce the pilot episode of a new series for TNT, it was announced on Monday.

headline.main: TNT Orders Crime-Drama Pilot From Former 'Walking Dead' Producer
